document_data.name: Sureene Aumratha
document_data.mainbody: '''Sureene Aumratha''' was the high priestess of [[Selûne]] in [[Thentia]] ''circa'' {{yearlink|1367}} and in {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rite}} She was the head of Thentia's [[House of the Moon]].
document_data.Description: As of 1373 [[DR]], Sureene Aumratha was a middle-aged woman, tall, handsome, with hair dyed moon blond.{{cite book/The Rite}}
document_data.Activities: Sureene was a shrewd businesswoman, who wisely invested the offerings in the temple in shipbuilding and caravans. She was said to be the wealthiest woman in the city.
document_data.Relationships: She had two deputies, [[Jannatha Goldenshield]] and [[Baerimel Dunnath]], both trained by [[Firefingers]].
document_data.History: Sureene aided [[Taegan Nightwind]] by casting lie-detection spells on the other mages aiding the effort to decrypt [[Sammaster]]'s notes on the [[Rage of Dragons]] in 1373 DR. She also kept [[Rilitar Shadow-water]] comfortable and cared for in his final moments.
